subject: Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: The Irish team of Peter O’Leary and Stephen Milne grabbed the lead at the end of the third leg of the Bacardi Cup regatta on Biscayne Bay off Miami. John Dane III and Austin Sperry of the United States, the 2006 winners of the Bacardi Cup, were close behind. Iain Percy and Andrew Simpson of Britain finished third to claim the overall lead in the regatta with three races remaining. The Brazilians Lars Grael and Marcel Jordao were in second.
